CustomField.description: US-0018713 User Story [AU] Coupon Click Contract Templates to be sent to AU Sellers US-0009346 - Add "Seller Funding %" field to the Coupon Co-Invest page layout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated as (Coupon Discount %) * (Seller Share %). This value will be sent in the seller email contract for Coupons with "Coupon Co-invest Type" = GMV. Also will be used in BCD calculation process (billing).
CustomField.label: Seller Funding %
